metadata.title: CVE-2016-2519 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
ntpd in NTP before 4.2.8p7 and 4.3.x before 4.3.92 allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (ntpd abort) by a large request data value,which triggers the ctl_getitem function to return a NULL value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntp - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5
ntpdate - 1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ntp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p4+dfsg-3ubuntu5.5').
